div.span: US-WI-Green Bay, US-AZ-Phoenix, US-Texas-San Antonio, US-Missouri-Springfield, US-OH-Cincinnati, US-FL-Tampa

font.font:
- VSP
Assignment: Quality Operations, Compliance and Accreditation
Location: Work at home

Humana’s dream is to help our members and our own associates achieve lifelong well-being. Use your clinical experience to work with patients and providers in a nontraditional environment where your knowledge will make a difference.
Be a part of our Clinical Space – as a Clinical Advisor in Quality Operations you will be working to improve the members’ lifelong wellbeing and health.

Humana is seeking a Quality Operations, Compliance and Accreditation nurse. You will collaborate with other Humana departments and our network providers as it relates to Quality activities associated with HEDIS, CAHPS, CMS, NCQA and any other compliance requirements for the Health Plan.
As a Quality Nurse you will be responsible for:

li.style: BACKGROUND: white; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Contacting providers for records needed for reviews via phone, mail or fax

li.style: BACKGROUND: white; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Compliance to state, CMS, and federal regulations

li.style: BACKGROUND: white; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Pass HEDIS IRR and HEDIS Measure Test after training is completed

li.style: BACKGROUND: white; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Review and Research HEDIS records with accuracy and timely

li.style: BACKGROUND: white; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Pass HEDIS MRRV with no major issues found

li.style: BACKGROUND: white; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Work flexible hours throughout the HEDIS season as needed

li.style: BACKGROUND: white; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Interact with Commercial and Medicare Market leaders, other departments, and the community to promote Humana programs and strategic initiatives.

li.style: BACKGROUND: white; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: This role is a VSP: Variable Staffing Pool are Associates who work flexible hours to meet business needs, with no guaranteed minimum or maximum number of hours in any week.

li.style: BACKGROUND: white; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in
BACKGROUND: white; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Ability to be licensed in multiple states without restrictions.

li.style: BACKGROUND: white; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Minimum of 3 years prior clinical experience preferably in an acute care, skilled or rehabilitation clinical setting.

li.style: BACKGROUND: white; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Ability to work independently under general instructions and with a team.

li.style: BACKGROUND: white; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Valid driver's license and/or dependable transportation necessary.

li.style: BACKGROUND: white; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Excellent computer skills and knowledge of Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint.

span.font: Education: BSN or Bachelor’s degree in a related field

li.style: BACKGROUND: white; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Knowledge of HEDIS specifications and data collection

li.style: BACKGROUND: white; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in

span.font: Previous experience in quality or utilization management

font.font: At Humana, we know your well-being is important to you, and it’s important to us too. That’s why we’re committed to making resources available to you that will enable you to become happier, healthier, and more productive in all areas of your life. If you share our passion for helping people, we likely have the right place for you at Humana.

div.span:
At Humana, we’re also committed to making the resources available to you that will enable you to become happier, healthier, and more productive in all areas of your life. We know your well-being is important to you, and it’s important to us too.
If you share our passion for helping people, we likely have the right place for you at Humana. After applying, we encourage you to join our Talent Network as well, so you can stay informed and up to date on what’s happening around our organization in the changing world of healthcare.
